features.title: Secure Sign-Up with Mobile OTP
features.description: We've added extra security to your sign-up! When you register, we'll send you a code to make sure it's really you. Our system checks your mobile number carefully to avoid any fakes. Each sign-up is unique—no sharing numbers here! It's all about keeping things simple and secure. Trust the process, enjoy the security!

features.title: Smart Defense Against Spam: Mobile OTP API Protection
features.description: We've implemented smart safeguards to protect our Mobile OTP API from misuse. Users can't request OTPs too frequently—there's a two-minute cooldown implimented on both client side and in our database. This not only stops automated bots but also ensures the reliability and security of your Mobile OTP API, defending it against spam and misuse.

features.title: Profile Details in Sign-Up
features.description: Once your mobile number is verified, it's time to create your profile! Register with your first name, last name, and a unique username. You can add your email if you like (totally optional), share your gender, birthdate, bio, and even your address. It's your space to personalize and connect with others—making your profile uniquely yours right from the start.

features.title: Diverse Profile Pictures: Your Style, Your Choice
features.description: Tailor your profile with ease! Whether it's from your local storage, a camera click, or third-party platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, Zoom, Box—take your pick. Fetch images from any link, or explore Unsplash for that perfect profile picture. Plus, don't forget, you can edit your picture on the spot while uploading. Your profile is uniquely yours—express yourself with the picture that suits your style!

features.title: Username Guidelines: Your Unique Identifier
features.description: Crafting your username? Follow these guidelines for a unique and personalized touch. Choose a unique username using only small alphabets (a-z), dots, or underscores. Avoid special characters (!@#$%^&*;'...), spaces, or capital letters (A-Z). Don't worry if inspiration doesn't strike—we can create a username for you that aligns perfectly with these guidelines. Your username is your distinct identifier—make it uniquely yours!

features.title: Secure Password Creation: Strength at Your Fingertips
features.description: Strengthen your profile security by crafting a robust password. Ensure it contains a minimum of 8 characters, including letters (both uppercase and lowercase), numbers, and special characters. Worried about the strength of your password? Fear not! Our system provides clear indicators to help you assess whether your password is strong, weak, or somewhere in between. Your profile's safety is in your hands—create a password that stands up to the challenge!

features.title: Multiple Authentication Options
features.description: Users can seamlessly log in using unique username, registered mobile number, or their verified registered email ID, providing flexibility and convenience in the authentication process.

features.title: Password Recovery
features.description: Enable users to securely reset forgotten passwords by verifying their mobile number through OTP and setting a new password for account access. This ensures a streamlined process for users to regain control of their accounts while maintaining security measures.

features.title: Password History Restriction
features.description: Enhance account security by implementing a password history restriction feature. Users, when resetting their password, are prevented from reusing their old passwords. This safeguard ensures that compromised passwords from the past do not pose a security risk, contributing to a more secure user environment.

features.title: Passwordless Login via Email Link
features.description: Provide users with a convenient passwordless login option by utilizing their registered and verified email address. Users receive a secure and unique link in their registered email, which they can use to securely access their accounts without the need for a traditional password. This streamlined process enhances user experience while maintaining a high level of security.

features.title: Secure Email Login Link Expiry
features.description: Enhance security by implementing a time-sensitive expiry for the secure, unique login links sent to users via email. Each link has a 15-minute expiration period, reducing the risk of unauthorized access. Initiating a new login link automatically invalidates the old link, adding an extra layer of protection against potential security threats and ensuring the security of user accounts.

features.title: Secure Email Link Resend Delay
features.description: Implement a deliberate 2-minute delay for users attempting to resend the secure login link. This intentional delay, enforced on both client and server sides, acts as a safeguard against automation and bot attacks. By incorporating this security measure, users are prevented from bypassing the designated time window for link resending, enhancing overall system security.

features.title: Flexible Login Window Selection
features.description: Offer users flexibility in choosing their login window/tab after opening the secure unique login link. Whether initiated on a laptop or mobile device, users can decide to log in on the current window/tab or the one from which they requested the login link. This feature provides convenience to users, allowing them to choose the login environment that best suits their preferences and needs.

features.title: Temporary Access via Secure Login Link
features.description: Enhance security and user control by providing a secure login link that grants temporary access to the account. If a user forgets to log out, the system automatically expires the access after a designated time, safeguarding the user's account. This feature also enables users to share temporary access with others without sharing their credentials, adding a layer of flexibility and security to account management.

features.title: User-Friendly Design
features.description: Craft a user-friendly profile page with an attractive design tailored for both small screens (mobile) and large screens (laptop/desktop). The layout ensures optimal presentation of information, offering an intuitive and visually pleasing experience for users on various devices. The user-friendly design enhances accessibility, allowing users to seamlessly navigate and interact with the profile page, regardless of the screen size.

features.title: Total Responsive Design
features.description: Implement a fully responsive design for the user profile page, ensuring compatibility across a spectrum of screen sizes, from small screens (mobile) to large screens (laptop/desktop). This responsiveness guarantees a consistent and optimal user experience, allowing users to access and interact with the profile page seamlessly on any device, without compromising design or functionality.

features.title: Single-Page Workflow
features.description: Optimize user interaction by consolidating all actions within the user profile page onto a single page. This approach ensures a seamless and efficient workflow for users. Whether it's updating information, managing followers, or engaging in various profile-related activities, users can perform all actions within the confines of the user profile page, streamlining the overall user experience.

features.title: Comprehensive Profile Information
features.description: Present a comprehensive set of user information on the profile page, including full name, username, bio, profile picture, follower count, following count, follow request count, user posts, and post count. The page also features all necessary buttons for profile-related actions. The user-friendly design ensures that this wealth of information is presented in a clear and accessible manner, enhancing the overall user experience.

features.title: Profile Picture Editing Options
features.description: Empower users with diverse options for editing their profile picture. Users can upload images from local storage, capture photos using their device camera, select from third-party platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, Box, Zoom, or even use any image link. Additionally, users have the creative option to choose images from Unsplash, providing a rich array of choices to personalize their profile picture. After selecting an image, users can further edit and enhance that image according to their preferences, ensuring a customized and visually appealing profile picture.

features.title: Username Editing with Validation
features.description: Facilitate username editing for users while enforcing uniqueness and adhering to specified restrictions. Users can choose a new username, and the system ensures its uniqueness and compliance with validation criteria. In cases where users lack ideas, the system can generate a unique username. This feature streamlines the process of updating usernames while maintaining integrity and adherence to platform requirements.

features.title: Flexible Profile Information Editing
features.description: Provide users with the flexibility to edit various profile details, including first name, last name, bio, birthday, gender, and location. This feature empowers users to customize their profile information, tailoring it to reflect their preferences and personal details. Users can easily update and modify these fields, contributing to a dynamic and personalized user experience.

features.title: Secure Password Change Verification
features.description: Ensure a secure password change process by requiring users to have access to their old password. This verification step adds an essential layer of security, preventing unauthorized password changes even if someone gains temporary access to the user's account. By enforcing the need for the current password, the system mitigates the risk of unauthorized modifications to account credentials.

features.title: Password Change with History Restriction
features.description: Improve account security during password changes by implementing a restriction on using old passwords. Users, when updating their passwords, are prevented from reusing any of their previous passwords. This security measure ensures that compromised old passwords do not pose a risk to the account's integrity, fortifying the overall protection of user accounts.

features.title: Password Change with Confirmation
features.description: Allow users to change their password while logged in, providing an added layer of security. During this process, users must input their current password and confirm the new password. This double-entry requirement ensures accuracy and prevents accidental password changes, enhancing the security and integrity of the account credentials.

features.title: Add and Verify New Email
features.description: Empower users to enhance their account security by attaching a new, unique email to their profile. Users can initiate this process at any time, receiving a verification link via email. Upon verification, the new email becomes associated with the account, allowing users to utilize it for login and various features where email verification is required. This feature provides flexibility and an additional layer of account protection.

features.title: Flexible Email Management
features.description: Grant users the ability to update their email with a new, unique address at any time. This process requires users to undergo a verification procedure for added security. Additionally, users can choose to remove their email altogether, offering an extra layer of security in case of email compromise. This feature empowers users to manage their email settings proactively, enhancing overall account security and control.

features.title: Email Verification Safeguards
features.description: Implement safeguards to prevent misuse of email-related features. Users are required to wait 2-3 minutes before being able to resend a verification link or change their email. This intentional delay, enforced on both client and server sides, acts as a protective measure against potential abuse. By introducing this restriction, the system enhances security and ensures responsible use of email-related functionalities.

features.title: Seamless Email Verification Handling
features.description: Provide a seamless user experience by automatically managing email verification without requiring users to refresh the page or take additional actions. Once the user completes the email verification process, the system seamlessly updates the status on the login page. This feature enhances user convenience, ensuring a smooth transition after email verification without disrupting the login workflow.

features.title: Flexible Profile Privacy Settings
features.description: By default, each user profile is set to private, safeguarding personal information. Users have the flexibility to switch between public and private settings at their discretion. This feature empowers users to control the visibility of their profile, ensuring privacy when needed and allowing for public sharing when desired. The ability to customize privacy settings adds a layer of user autonomy and personalization to the platform.

features.title: Private Profile: Information Privacy
features.description: Maintain strict privacy for users with private profiles, ensuring that no other user can access or share information with the profile owner without explicit permission. In this mode, the private information of the user remains concealed from others, promoting a secure and confidential environment for users who choose to keep their profiles private.

features.title: Public Profile: Information Visibility
features.description: In the case of a public profile, other users can freely access the profile owner's information and share information with them. This open setting encourages a more transparent and collaborative environment, allowing users to easily connect and engage with others who have chosen to make their profiles public.

features.title: Feedback and Bug Reporting
features.description: Facilitate user engagement by providing an option for users to submit feedback, suggestions, or report bugs. Upon submission, the server securely stores and maintains these inputs along with the associated user information. This feature encourages user participation in improving the platform, fostering a collaborative relationship between users and developers for ongoing enhancements and issue resolution.

features.title: Secure Logout and Account Switching
features.description: Ensure a secure logout experience for users, allowing them to seamlessly sign out of their current account. Following a secure logout, users can conveniently log in with another account of their choice. This feature prioritizes both security and user flexibility, offering a smooth transition between different user accounts on the platform.

features.title: Real-Time Follow System
features.description: Immerse users in a dynamic social experience with a real-time follow system. Changes in follower counts, following lists, follow requests, and sent follow request lists are reflected instantly without requiring a page reload. This real-time functionality enhances user engagement, providing a seamless and responsive social networking environment.

features.title: Followers and Following Lists
features.description: Enrich user profiles by showcasing follower and following counts. Additionally, users have the ability to view a detailed list of followers and those they are following back. This feature enhances user visibility into their social network, fostering connections and interactions within the platform.

features.title: Follower System Based on Account Privacy
features.description: Implement a follower system that aligns with account privacy settings. For public accounts, any user can follow directly. However, for private accounts, individuals must send a follow request. The account owner has the authority to accept or decline the follow request, providing control over who can access their content and contribute to a secure and consent-driven environment.

features.title: Manage Follow Requests
features.description: Empower users with the ability to manage follow requests by providing a list of pending requests. Users can review and decide whether to accept or delete each follow request, offering control over their follower base. This feature enhances user autonomy in curating their social connections and fostering a tailored online experience.

features.title: Manage Sent Follow Requests
features.description: Enhance user engagement by providing a list of sent follow requests that are pending acceptance. Users have the option to cancel pending follow requests at any time and resend them if desired. This feature grants users flexibility and control over their social connections, ensuring a personalized and dynamic experience on the platform.

features.title: Manage Followers
features.description: Provide users with the ability to manage their followers by allowing them to remove followers if desired. This feature empowers users to curate their follower list, ensuring that they have control over their online connections. Whether for privacy or personal preference, users can make decisions about who remains in their follower base.

features.title: Manage Following
features.description: Grant users the ability to manage accounts they are following by allowing them to unfollow at any time. Additionally, users can choose to follow again if the profile is public or send a follow request if the profile is private. This feature provides users with flexibility and control over their network connections, ensuring a personalized and dynamic social experience.

features.title: Limited Follower and Following Visibility
features.description: Introduce a nuanced follower system where followers can access detailed follower and following lists of the user. However, for other users, only the count is displayed. This feature strikes a balance between user privacy and follower engagement, offering followers additional insights while preserving the privacy of the user's social connections from the general audience.

features.title: User-Friendly Chat Page Design
features.description: Craft a user-friendly design for the chat page that seamlessly adapts to both small screens (mobile) and large screens (laptop/desktop). This ensures a consistent and intuitive user experience across different devices, enhancing accessibility and usability for all users engaging in conversations on the platform.

features.title: Seamless Single-Page Chat Experience
features.description: Provide users with a seamless chat experience by implementing a single-page design. Users can engage in conversations without the need to reload pages in between. This feature enhances the fluidity and continuity of chat interactions, allowing users to communicate without interruption and enjoy a smooth chatting experience.

features.title: Responsive Chat Design
features.description: Ensure a responsive chat section that seamlessly adapts to various screen sizes, providing optimal performance on both small screens (mobile) and large screens (laptop/desktop). The design transitions smoothly when users switch between different screen sizes, guaranteeing a consistent and enjoyable chat experience regardless of the device being used.

features.title: Restricted One-to-One Chat Access
features.description: Implement a controlled messaging system where users can create one-to-one chat conversations only with those they follow. This restriction ensures that messaging privileges are tied to the follow relationship, adding an extra layer of privacy and consent to the chat functionality. Users must follow someone before initiating a one-to-one chat, fostering a more intentional and secure communication environment.

features.title: Exiting One-to-One Chat
features.description: Allow users to exit from a one-to-one chat by removing the other person from their followers list. This action ensures that the other person loses the ability to message them, providing users with control over their chat interactions and fostering a secure and personalized communication experience within the platform.

features.title: Retaining Chat History After Exiting
features.description: Even after exiting a one-to-one chat, users retain access to their old chat history. This feature allows users to revisit and review past conversations, providing a comprehensive record of their interactions. This functionality enhances the user experience by preserving valuable chat content for reference and reflection.

features.title: Resuming Chat Continuity
features.description: Facilitate seamless chat continuity by allowing users who follow each other again to pick up their conversation from where they left off. This feature enhances the user experience, ensuring that reconnected users can easily resume their chat interactions without any disruptions, contributing to a fluid and continuous communication experience within the platform.

features.title: One-to-One Chat Deletion
features.description: Empower users with the ability to delete one-to-one chats. This feature allows users to manage their chat history, offering control over their messaging environment. Whether for privacy or organization, users can easily remove individual chat conversations, enhancing their overall chat experience within the platform.

features.title: One-to-One Chat Deletion (For Other User)
features.description: Empower users with the ability to delete one-to-one chats not only from their own side but also from the other user's side. This feature provides users with a comprehensive level of control over their conversations, allowing them to manage chat history on both ends. By extending this capability, users can ensure a synchronized and privacy-conscious approach to chat management within the platform.

features.title: Customized Chat Appearance per Conversation with color
features.description: Offer users the flexibility to define unique chat appearances for different conversations. Users can choose from predefined colors or select any custom color for individual chats, allowing them to personalize the visual experience based on the nature or significance of each conversation. This feature adds a layer of personalization, contributing to a more tailored and visually distinctive chat interface.

features.title: Custom Image Chat Appearance
features.description: Enable users to further personalize their chat experience by allowing the use of custom images for changing chat appearance. This feature empowers users to express themselves creatively by incorporating unique visuals into the appearance of individual chats. It adds a personalized and visually rich dimension to the user's messaging environment.

features.title: Diverse Options for Custom Chat Image
features.description: Enhance user options for customizing chat appearance by allowing them to pick images from various sources. Users can select custom images from their local storage, capture from their camera, or choose from third-party platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Google Drive, Dropbox, and more. Additionally, users can directly use any image link or pick from the diverse collection on Unsplash. This feature provides users with a wide range of choices to personalize their chat experience.

features.title: Image Editing for Chat Appearance
features.description: Offer users a comprehensive customization experience by allowing them to edit the chosen image for chat appearance according to their preferences. This feature enables users to make adjustments, crop the image, ensuring that it aligns perfectly with their desired chat aesthetic. The capability to edit selected images adds a layer of creativity and personalization to the chat appearance customization process.

features.title: Reset to Default Chat Appearance
features.description: Provide users with the convenience of reverting to the default chat appearance in a single click. This feature ensures flexibility and ease of use, allowing users to experiment with customizations and, when desired, quickly return to the default visual theme. It adds a layer of user-friendly functionality to the chat appearance customization feature.

features.title: One-Click Clearing of One-to-One Chat
features.description: Empower users with the ability to clear all messages in a one-to-one chat with a single click. This feature provides users with a convenient and efficient way to manage their own chat history. It streamlines the chat interface, allowing users to maintain a clutter-free and organized conversation space within the platform.

features.title: Personalized One-to-One Chat History
features.description: Implement a personalized chat history approach where clearing all messages in a one-to-one chat with a single click only affects the user initiating the action. The messages on the other side remain unchanged, preserving a consistent history for both users. This feature maintains a separate and personal chat history, ensuring a considerate and individualized experience for each user involved in the conversation.

features.title: Chat Recovery Through User Report
features.description: Introduce a safeguard for users by enabling the recovery of cleared chats through the reporting feature. If a user reports a specific chat, the platform can facilitate the retrieval of the full chat history for that user. This feature adds an additional layer of user support and ensures that important conversations can be recovered when needed, contributing to a reliable and responsive chat experience.

features.title: Preview Latest Messages or Notifications
features.description: Facilitate quick access to information by allowing users to preview the latest messages or notifications from all chats without opening each one individually. This feature streamlines the user experience, providing a convenient way to stay updated on recent activity across multiple chats. Users can efficiently manage their conversations and prioritize interactions based on the latest content.

features.title: Distinct Visual Representation for Latest Message Types
features.description: Enhance user awareness by visually differentiating between various types of messages or notifications in the latest message section. This feature ensures that different message types are uniquely presented, enabling users to quickly identify and comprehend the nature of each message directly from the latest message display. The distinct visual representation adds clarity and efficiency to the user's interaction with the messaging platform.

features.title: Preview Arrival Time of Latest Messages or Notifications
features.description: Improve user awareness by displaying the arrival time of the latest messages or notifications in each chat from the all-chat section. This feature allows users to quickly assess when the most recent activity occurred across their various conversations without the need to open each chat individually. Enhancing user awareness contributes to a more informed and efficient chat management experience.

features.title: Online Status Indication in One-to-One Chat
features.description: Improve user engagement by displaying the online status of the other user directly on the latest page of one-to-one chats. Users can quickly ascertain whether the other user is currently online without navigating into the chat. This feature adds a real-time dimension to the user interface, enhancing the overall user experience and facilitating timely and meaningful interactions.

features.title: Comprehensive Chat Information Display
features.description: Enrich the user experience by providing comprehensive chat information directly within the chat interface. Users can easily view details such as the other user's name, bio, profile picture, and active status without navigating to a separate section. This feature streamlines user interactions, offering valuable context and real-time information for more engaging and informed conversations.

features.title: Real-Time User Active Status in Chat Section
features.description: Enhance user engagement by presenting the real-time active status of the other user directly within the chat section. Users can easily determine whether the other user is currently active and, if inactive, view the timestamp of their last activity. This feature provides valuable insights into the availability of other users, fostering more informed and timely interactions within the chat platform.

features.title: Effortless Sharing of Other User's Profile
features.description: Streamline user interactions by enabling users to share the profile of the other user in a one-to-one chat with just one click. features.title: Direct Profile Visit from Chat
features.description: Facilitate seamless navigation for users by allowing them to visit the profile of the other user directly from the chat interface. Enhancing the overall user experience, this feature promotes a more connected and informed chat environment.

features.title: Customizable Group Chat Creation
features.description: Empower users to create group chats with personalized titles, descriptions, and group pictures. This feature adds a layer of customization to group communication, allowing users to tailor the group chat experience according to the nature or purpose of the conversation. features.title: Group Image Editing

features.title: Search and Add Following Members to Group Chat
features.description: Enhance user convenience by providing the ability to search and add members whom the user is already following to a group chat. This feature streamlines the process of forming group chats, allowing users to easily locate and include specific individuals they have established connections with through the follow system. The search functionality adds efficiency to the group chat creation process.

features.title: Group Chat Creation Notification for Members
features.description: Improve communication transparency by sending notifications to all members when a group chat is created. The group admin informs each member that they will be added to the newly created group. This feature ensures that all participants are aware of their inclusion in the group chat, promoting a clear and informed communication environment within the platform.

features.title: Admin-Controlled Group Chat Information
features.description: Endow group chat administrators with comprehensive control by allowing them to update all the information associated with the group chat, such as title, description, and picture. The same restrictions and features available during the initial creation of the group chat are maintained, providing admins with flexibility and authority to adapt the group chat settings as needed.

features.title: Admin Authority in Group Chat Membership
features.description: Empower group chat admins with the ability to manage group membership by allowing them to remove any member from the group or add any following member. This feature ensures that group chat administrators have control over the composition of the group, facilitating efficient moderation and ensuring that the group aligns with its intended purpose or focus.

features.title: Group Information Update Notification
features.description: Facilitate seamless communication within the group by notifying all members when the group chat admin updates any information related to the group. features.title: Leaving Group Chat
features.description: Allow group chat members to leave the group at their convenience, providing the flexibility for individuals to manage their group memberships based on their preferences and engagement levels. This feature empowers users with control over their group participation, ensuring a user-friendly and accommodating group chat experience within the platform.

features.title: Group Chat Member Departure Notification
features.description: Notify all group members when a member leaves the group. This feature promotes transparency and keeps all group members informed about changes in the group composition, fostering a cohesive and well-informed group chat environment.

features.title: Retaining Chat History After Leaving Group
features.description: Even after leaving a group chat, members retain access to their old chat history, preserving the continuity of past conversations. This feature ensures that users can revisit and reference their previous interactions, maintaining a seamless and personalized user experience within the platform.

features.title: Privacy-Focused Rejoining of Group Chat
features.description: Enhance privacy measures by allowing users who rejoin a group chat to access only their old chat history and new conversations. This feature ensures that users cannot access the chat content generated during their absence, promoting a more secure and privacy-centric user experience within the platform.

features.title: Restricted Group Chat Joining
features.description: Enable a controlled group chat environment by allowing members to join a group chat only if the group chat admin adds them. To be added, members must be followed by the admin. This feature ensures that group chat membership remains intentional and controlled, enhancing the admin's ability to manage the composition of the group.

features.title: Member Addition Notification in Group
features.description: Promote transparency and communication within the group by notifying all members when a new member is added to the group. This feature ensures that every member is promptly informed about changes in the group composition, fostering a sense of community and awareness within the group chat environment.

features.title: Privacy-Focused Access for New Members in Group Chat
features.description: Establish privacy measures for new users joining a group chat, allowing them to access only new chat conversations upon joining. This feature ensures that new users cannot access chat content generated before their entry, promoting a more secure and privacy-centric user experience within the platform.

features.title: Admin-Controlled Group Chat Deletion
features.description: Grant group chat admins the authority to delete the group chat at their discretion. This feature empowers admins with the ability to efficiently manage group chats, facilitating the removal of groups that are no longer needed. Admins can exercise this control to maintain a streamlined and relevant group chat environment within the platform.

features.title: Recovery Option After Group Chat Deletion
features.description: Incorporate a recovery option by allowing a deleted group chat to be restored if any member reports it. This feature adds a layer of flexibility, providing a mechanism for chat recovery in case a member accidentally deletes the chat or needs to retrieve important information. It ensures a user-centric approach to managing deleted group chats within the platform.

features.title: Customized Group Chat Appearance by Admin with Color
features.description: Empower group chat administrators with the ability to customize the appearance of the group chat. Admins can define unique chat appearances, choosing from predefined colors or selecting any custom color for the group chat. This feature allows admins to personalize the visual experience of the group chat, adding a layer of customization and distinctiveness to the chat interface.

features.title: Custom Image Group Chat Appearance by Admin
features.description: Grant group chat administrators the ability to personalize the group chat experience by using custom images for changing the chat appearance. This feature empowers admins to creatively express the group's identity by incorporating unique visuals into the appearance of the group chat. It adds a personalized and visually rich dimension to the group's messaging environment.

features.title: Message Timestamps
features.description: Every message is accompanied by a timestamp, indicating the exact moment it was created within the chat. This feature allows users to track the timing of messages, facilitating a chronological understanding of the conversation and enabling efficient navigation through the chat history.

features.title: Fast and Secure AWS S3 Bucket for Media Storage
features.description: Elevating both speed and security, our chat application relies on a secure and high-performance AWS S3 bucket for all forms of media storage. This strategic choice not only prioritizes the protection of user data but also ensures a swift and efficient experience when storing and retrieving media files in the chat environment. By combining speed and security, we aim to provide users with a seamless and responsive media-sharing experience within the application.

features.title: Enhanced Security with Server-Verified Presigned URLs For Uploads
features.description: In the secure AWS S3 bucket, users are restricted to uploading files solely through presigned URLs generated on our server. This stringent process ensures that file uploads to the AWS S3 bucket are only possible after our server verifies the user and generates a presigned URL. This robust system serves as a formidable barrier, preventing any unauthorized individuals from uploading files to the AWS S3 bucket and reinforcing the overall security of our chat system.

features.title: Secure Media Access with Presigned URLs
features.description: To ensure secure access to media files from the AWS S3 bucket, our chat system utilizes a robust process. A secure presigned URL, generated on our server, is required for users to access any media file. Our system rigorously verifies the user's identity and permissions before generating a presigned URL for the requested media file. This meticulous process prevents unauthorized users from accessing media files. Furthermore, these presigned URLs have a limited lifespan, expiring after a few minutes, adding an extra layer of security by preventing unauthorized sharing of the URLs.

features.title: Direct AWS S3 Interaction for Media Upload and Access
features.description: Streamlining the process for both media uploads and access, users directly interact with the AWS S3 bucket using presigned URLs generated by our server. This approach significantly enhances speed and reduces server load by eliminating the need for our server to act as an intermediary. Users can seamlessly upload and access media files, resulting in a more efficient and responsive experience within the chat system.

features.title: Media Encoding with Transloadit Service
features.description: To tailor media according to our specifications, we leverage the Transloadit service for encoding before storing it in the AWS S3 bucket. This versatile service allows us to encode videos by resizing, auto-correcting badly rotated videos, extracting thumbnails, and more. For images, we can convert them into various formats, apply effects and watermarks, crop, rotate, and resize images intelligently, and optimize images to reduce size by up to 80% without quality loss. Additionally, Transloadit enables us to encode audio by looping tracks, generating waveform images, concatenating audio files, normalizing loudness, and more. This comprehensive media encoding process enhances the quality, format, and presentation of media files within our chat system, ensuring a customized and optimized experience for users.

features.title: User-Friendly Design for Call Section
features.description: The call section is meticulously crafted with a user-friendly design that seamlessly adapts to both small screens, such as mobile devices, and large screens, like desktops. This thoughtful approach ensures a consistent and intuitive user experience across various devices, enhancing accessibility and usability for all users engaging in calls.

features.title: Responsive Design for Call Section
features.description: The call section boasts a responsive design that dynamically adjusts to the screen size, ensuring optimal user experience on both small screens (mobile) and large screens (desktop). This responsiveness enhances accessibility, providing users with a seamless and visually appealing interface regardless of the device they use for their calls.

features.title: Immersive Sound Effects in Call System
features.description: The call system is enriched with accurate sound effects for every event, creating an immersive auditory experience. Users encounter distinctive sound cues for events such as call initiation, call connecting, call ringing, receiving a call, user join notifications, call disconnection, and more. This feature adds a layer of engagement and user feedback, enhancing the overall sensory experience within the call system.

features.title: Tabbed Call Section for Multitasking
features.description: The call section is initiated in a separate tab, allowing users to continue communicating through chat with other individuals and stay active in different conversations. This feature enables users to initiate multiple calls simultaneously while still connecting each call with the respective chat. By leveraging multi-tab call initiation, users can efficiently manage and engage in numerous calls, fostering a seamless and productive communication experience within the call system.

features.title: Universal Call Notifications
features.description: When a user creates a call, other users receive the call notification irrespective of the page or chat they are currently in. This universal notification feature ensures that users are promptly informed of incoming calls, promoting a responsive and streamlined communication experience within the call system. Users can stay connected and aware of calls regardless of their current location within the application, enhancing overall accessibility and responsiveness.

features.title: User Pinning in Call Display
features.description: Within the call system, users have the ability to pin as many participants as they desire on their display. By default, all users are unpinned and visible in the sidebar. When a user chooses to pin someone, the display adjusts dynamically, ensuring that the pinned user is prominently and beautifully displayed on the screen. This feature enhances user customization and visual focus during calls, providing an enriched and personalized call experience.

features.title: Sidebar Toggle for Distraction-Free Calls
features.description: Users in the call system can toggle the sidebar, allowing them to hide or show it as per their preference. This feature empowers users to focus on important individuals by pinning them to their display while minimizing distractions. By customizing the visibility of the sidebar, users can create a more streamlined and distraction-free environment during calls, enhancing their overall call experience.

features.title: Audio Call Support
features.description: The call system provides robust support for audio calls, allowing users to engage in high-quality and clear audio conversations. This feature enhances communication by offering a reliable and efficient platform for users to connect through voice, fostering seamless interaction within the call system.

features.title: Mute/Unmute Functionality in Audio Calls
features.description: During audio calls in the call system, users have the flexibility to mute or unmute their audio. This feature empowers users with control over their audio presence during a call, allowing for a personalized and adaptable communication experience.

features.title: Seamless Audio-to-Video Call Transition
features.description: Users in the audio call have the convenience to switch to a video call at any time and seamlessly transition back to the audio call as needed. This feature enhances the user experience by providing flexibility in communication modes, ensuring users can effortlessly adapt their calls based on the nature of the conversation.

features.title: Audio-to-Screen Share Transition
features.description: During an audio call, users can seamlessly switch to screen share mode and effortlessly return to the audio call when needed. This feature enriches the communication experience by providing users with the flexibility to share their screens, facilitating effective collaboration and communication within the call system.

features.title: Flexible Call Termination in Audio Calls
features.description: Users have the autonomy to disconnect the call at any time during an audio call. This feature ensures flexibility and convenience, allowing users to conclude the conversation as needed, providing a user-centric approach to managing audio calls within the call system.

features.title: Simultaneous Multi-Audio Call Support
features.description: The call system facilitates users to join multiple audio calls simultaneously, allowing for versatile and efficient communication. This feature enables users to participate in multiple conversations concurrently, enhancing their ability to manage and engage in diverse discussions within the call system.

features.title: Individual Call Management in Multi-Audio Calls
features.description: When a user is engaged in multiple audio calls, they can efficiently manage each call individually by muting or unmuting as per their preference. This feature empowers users with granular control, enabling them to customize their participation in each call, ensuring a seamless and organized multitasking experience within the call system.

features.title: Comprehensive Call Details Display
features.description: Users can access comprehensive details of any call they are in within the call system. The information includes the name of the call, which could be the other person's name in a one-to-one call, the group name in a group call, or the name of the public call room. Additionally, users can view relevant descriptions, such as the other person's bio in a one-to-one call, the group description in a group call, or the description of the public call room. Users can also see information about other participants in the call room, providing a rich and informative overview of the ongoing call.

features.title: Secure Call Room Link Sharing
features.description: In cases where another user is not online, the call system allows users to generate a unique and secure call room link. This link can be copied and shared with others, enabling them to join the call by simply accessing the provided link. This feature enhances accessibility and collaboration by offering a convenient way for users to connect to a call even if the other participant is not currently online.

features.title: Video Call Support
features.description: The call system seamlessly supports video calls, allowing users to engage in visually enriched and high-quality video conversations. This feature adds an extra layer of depth to communication, providing users with a versatile and immersive platform for connecting through both audio and video within the call system.

features.title: Mute/Unmute Functionality in Video Calls
features.description: During a video call within the call system, users have the flexibility to mute or unmute their video. This feature empowers users with control over their video presence during a call, allowing for a personalized and adaptable visual communication experience.

features.title: Camera On/Off in Video Calls
features.description: Users can easily toggle their camera on or off during a video call within the call system. This feature provides users with the flexibility to control their camera status, allowing for a customizable and adaptable visual communication experience based on individual preferences and needs.

features.title: Seamless Video-to-Audio Call Transition
features.description: Users in a video call have the convenience to switch to an audio call at any time and seamlessly transition back to the video call as needed. This feature enhances the user experience by providing flexibility in communication modes, ensuring users can effortlessly adapt their calls based on the nature of the conversation within the call system.

features.title: Video-to-Screen Share Transition
features.description: During a video call, users can seamlessly switch to screen share mode and effortlessly return to the video call when needed within the call system. This feature enriches the communication experience by providing users with the flexibility to share their screens, facilitating effective collaboration and communication within the call system.

features.title: Flexible Video Call Termination
features.description: Users have the autonomy to terminate a video call at any time within the call system. This feature ensures flexibility and convenience, allowing users to conclude the video conversation as needed, providing a user-centric approach to managing video calls within the call system.

features.title: Multi-Video Call Support
features.description: The call system supports users being in multiple video calls simultaneously, allowing for versatile and efficient video communication. This feature enables users to participate in multiple video conversations concurrently, enhancing their ability to manage and engage in diverse discussions within the call system.

features.title: Individual Call Management in Multi-Video Calls
features.description: When a user is engaged in multiple video calls, they can efficiently manage each call individually by muting or unmuting and toggling the camera on or off as per their preference. This feature empowers users with granular control, enabling them to customize their participation in each video call, ensuring a seamless and organized multitasking experience within the call system.

features.title: Comprehensive Video Call Details Display
features.description: Users can access comprehensive details of any video call they are in within the call system. The information includes the name of the video call, which could be the other person's name in a one-to-one video call, the group name in a group video call, or the name of the public video call room. Users can also see information about other participants in the video call room, providing a rich and informative overview of the ongoing video call.

features.title: Secure Video Call Room Link Sharing
features.description: In cases where another user is not online, the video call system allows users to generate a unique and secure video call room link. This link can be copied and shared with others, enabling them to join the video call by simply accessing the provided link. This feature enhances accessibility and collaboration by offering a convenient way for users to connect to a video call even if the other participant is not currently online.

features.title: Screen Sharing Capability
features.description: Users have the option to share their screen within the call system, facilitating effective collaboration and communication. This feature enables users to present content, showcase documents, or collaborate on projects by sharing their screens during audio or video calls, enhancing the overall versatility of the communication experience.

features.title: Versatile Screen Sharing Options
features.description: Users can choose from versatile screen sharing options within the call system, providing flexibility in their communication. Whether sharing the entire screen, a specific tab, or just a particular window, this feature allows users to tailor their screen sharing experience based on their communication needs. This versatility enhances collaboration by offering users precise control over the content they share during calls.

features.title: Seamless Transition after Screen Sharing
features.description: After concluding screen sharing, users seamlessly return to the normal call environment within the call system. This feature ensures a smooth and uninterrupted transition, allowing users to easily shift between screen sharing and regular call modes without any disruptions. Such a seamless experience enhances user engagement and collaboration during calls.

features.title: Pre-Call Mode Configuration
features.description: Before entering a call or creating one, users have the option to decide their preferred mode. They can check and configure their camera, microphone, and screen sharing settings, ensuring a personalized and prepared entry into the call. This feature provides users with control over their audio and video settings, contributing to a smooth and tailored call experience within the call system.

features.title: Error Handling and Solutions in Call System
features.description: In the event of permission errors or resource issues, such as camera or microphone problems, the call system displays clear error messages instead of initiating the camera preview. Furthermore, the system offers detailed solutions to address these issues, guiding users on resolving permission errors or troubleshooting resource problems. This user-centric approach ensures a seamless and supportive experience within the call system, addressing potential obstacles in real-time and providing users with the necessary tools to troubleshoot effectively.

features.title: Secure One-to-One Call Initiation
features.description: Users can initiate a one-to-one call with someone only if they are connected through an active chat. By clicking the call button within the chat with that person, users can securely start a one-to-one call. This feature acts as a safeguard, preventing random and unauthorized calls in the call system. It ensures that users engage in meaningful conversations with individuals they actively communicate with through chat, enhancing the overall security and purposefulness of the communication experience.

features.title: Real-time Call Status Updates
features.description: When a user initiates a one-to-one call, the call system provides real-time status updates, indicating when the call is connecting and when it starts ringing for the other person. Accompanied by corresponding sound effects, this feature enhances the user experience by keeping them informed about the progression of the call. Users receive instant feedback on the call's status, ensuring a transparent and engaging communication experience within the call system.

features.title: Timed Call Termination for Unanswered Calls
features.description: To optimize user experience and prevent prolonged waiting times, the call system features automatic call termination if the other user does not receive the call within a specified time frame. This ensures efficiency and timely communication, preventing extended periods of ringing and enhancing the overall responsiveness of the call system. Users can initiate calls with the confidence that, if unanswered, the system will gracefully conclude the call, promoting a seamless and user-friendly communication experience.

features.title: Shareable Call Links for Offline Participants
features.description: After creating a call, if the other person is not active or online, the user has the option to copy and share the call link with another user. This feature facilitates seamless call participation for individuals who may not be actively using the application at the moment. By sharing the call link, users can extend invitations and ensure that others can join the call without the need to be actively online in our application. This enhances accessibility and collaboration, promoting inclusive communication within the call system.

features.title: Join Option for Incoming One-to-One Calls
features.description: When a one-to-one call is initiated by another user, the recipient receives a call notification with the option to join the call. This feature provides users with immediate and convenient access to incoming calls, enhancing the responsiveness of the communication experience within the call system. Users can seamlessly respond to call invitations, ensuring quick and efficient connection with others in one-to-one calls.

features.title: Delayed Join for Incoming One-to-One Calls
features.description: In a one-to-one call, if the other person is not active when the call is initiated and comes online later, they will receive a coming call notification in the specific one-to-one chat. The user can join the call using the 'Join' button displayed in that chat at that time. This feature ensures that even if the other person is initially inactive during the call initiation, they can still seamlessly join the ongoing call upon returning online. It enhances flexibility and convenience in one-to-one call interactions within the call system.

features.title: Decline Option for Incoming One-to-One Calls
features.description: When a one-to-one call is initiated by another user, the recipient receives a call notification with the option to decline the call. This feature empowers users to make quick decisions regarding incoming calls, providing flexibility and control over their communication within the call system. Users can choose to decline calls as needed, ensuring a personalized and responsive approach to managing incoming one-to-one calls.

features.title: Real-time Status Update on Call Decline
features.description: When a user declines a call, the other user receives a real-time status update indicating that the call has ended. This feature ensures immediate and transparent communication of the call's status, allowing users to stay informed about the outcome. The real-time status update enhances the overall user experience within the call system, promoting clear and instant communication between users during call interactions.

features.title: Ignore Option for Incoming One-to-One Calls
features.description: When a one-to-one call is initiated by another user, the recipient receives a call notification with the option to ignore the call. This feature provides users with the flexibility to temporarily ignore incoming calls, allowing them to focus on other activities without immediately declining or joining call. While the call is ignored, the other user receives a real-time status update indicating the call status. This feature enhances user control and responsiveness within the call system, ensuring a personalized approach to managing incoming calls.

features.title: Post-Ignoring Join Option
features.description: Following the decision to ignore a call, users have the option to join the call later by navigating to the relevant chat. If the call has not been terminated, a 'Join' button is displayed in the chat. This feature allows users to reengage with the call at their convenience, providing flexibility and control over their participation within the call system. Users can click on the 'Join' button to seamlessly connect with the ongoing call.

features.title: Automatic Termination and Status Update on Ignored Calls
features.description: When a user chooses to ignore a call, the call system automatically terminates the call after a specified time frame. Simultaneously, the other user receives a real-time status update indicating that the call was not answered, and the call has ended. This feature ensures a seamless and efficient handling of ignored calls, maintaining transparency and providing immediate communication about the call status within the call system. Users can manage incoming calls with flexibility, enhancing the overall user experience.

features.title: One-to-One Call Exit Flexibility
features.description: In a one-to-one call, after joining the call, any user has the flexibility to leave the call at any time. Upon choosing to exit, the call is immediately terminated. This feature ensures that participants have control over their participation, allowing them to exit the call whenever needed. It enhances user autonomy and responsiveness within the call system, providing a seamless and user-friendly experience for managing one-to-one calls.

features.title: Link Invalidation after One-to-One Call Ends
features.description: In a one-to-one call, when the call is ended, the link used for initiating the call becomes invalid. Users cannot reuse the same link to restart the call; instead, they need to initiate a new call. This security feature ensures that once a one-to-one call concludes, the associated link is no longer functional, adding an additional layer of privacy and preventing unauthorized access to past calls. It enhances the overall security and integrity of one-to-one call sessions within the call system.

features.title: Active User Transition to New Tab/Device in One-to-One Call
features.description: In a one-to-one call, if a user is actively participating in a call and attempts to join the same call from a different tab or device, the user will be seamlessly transitioned to the new tab or device, and simultaneously removed from the previous tab. This feature ensures continuity and provides users with the flexibility to switch between different devices or tabs while actively engaged in the call. It enhances the user experience by facilitating smooth transitions within one-to-one call sessions in the call system.

features.title: Group Call Initiation
features.description: In a group chat, every member of the group has the ability to initiate a call and wait for other members to join. This collaborative feature enhances group communication within the call system, allowing any group member to take the lead in initiating a call. Group members can seamlessly join the ongoing call, fostering interactive and inclusive discussions. This feature promotes a dynamic and participatory group communication experience, facilitating efficient coordination and engagement among group members.

features.title: Simultaneous Group Call Notifications
features.description: When any member of a group chat initiates a call within the group, all members of that group chat receive simultaneous notifications about the group call in the call system. This synchronized notification feature ensures that every group member is promptly informed about the ongoing group call, fostering efficient communication and enabling quick participation. The simultaneous notifications enhance the collaborative nature of group calls, allowing all members to stay connected and engaged in real-time within the call system.

features.title: Shareable Group Call Room Link for Inactive Members
features.description: In a group call initiated within a group, if some members are not active in that group at that time, any participating member has the option to copy and share the group call room link with inactive members. This feature enables direct access for inactive members to join the group call room by using the shared link. Importantly, the link ensures exclusivity, allowing only the group members to join the call room. This functionality enhances accessibility and collaboration, providing a convenient way for all group members to participate in the group call, even if they are momentarily inactive in the group.

features.title: Private Group Call Initiation and Joining
features.description: When any member initiates a group call within a group chat, all members of that group chat receive a call notification. Each member has the option to join the group call room. Importantly, only members of that specific group chat have the privilege to join the private group call room; no other users can access or join the call room. This feature ensures the exclusivity and privacy of group calls, fostering secure and focused communication among the members of the designated group within the call system.

features.title: Delayed Join for Incoming Group Calls
features.description: In a group call, if some members are not active when the call is initiated and come online later, they will receive a coming call notification in the specific group chat. The members can join the call using the 'Join' button displayed in that chat at that time. This feature ensures that even if some members are initially inactive during the group call initiation, they can still seamlessly join the ongoing call upon returning online. It enhances flexibility and convenience in group call interactions within the call system.

features.title: Pre-Join Group Call Member Preview
features.description: Before joining a group call, users can preview the list of participants who are already in the group. This information is conveniently displayed on the before-call configuration page in the call system. This feature provides users with an overview of the current participants, enabling them to make informed decisions about joining the group call. It enhances the user experience by offering transparency and allowing users to gauge the existing group dynamics before entering the call.

features.title: Ignore Option for Incoming Group Calls
features.description: When a group call is initiated by another user, the members of the group receive a call notification with the option to ignore the call. This feature provides group members with the flexibility to temporarily ignore incoming calls, allowing them to focus on other activities without immediately joining the call. This feature enhances group member control and responsiveness within the call system, ensuring a personalized approach to managing incoming group calls.

features.title: Post-Ignoring Join Option for Group Calls
features.description: Following the decision to ignore a group call, users have the option to join the call later by navigating to the relevant group chat. If the group call has not been terminated, a 'Join' button is displayed in the group chat. This feature allows users to reengage with the group call at their convenience, providing flexibility and control over their participation within the call system. Users can click on the 'Join' button to seamlessly connect with the ongoing group call.

features.title: Flexibility to Leave Group Call
features.description: In a group call, any member has the flexibility to leave the call at any time. This feature allows participants to exit the group call whenever necessary, providing them with control over their involvement. It ensures a dynamic and adaptable group call experience, where members can join or leave the call based on their preferences and availability. This flexibility enhances user autonomy and responsiveness within group call sessions in the call system.

features.title: Automatic Termination of Group Call
features.description: After a participant leaves a group call, if only one member remains in the call, the system automatically terminates the group call. This feature ensures an efficient and streamlined process for managing group calls. It prevents the call from continuing indefinitely with only one participant, optimizing the usage of resources and providing a seamless experience for users in the call system.

features.title: Link Invalidation after Group Call Ends
features.description: When a group call is ended, the associated group call link becomes invalid. No one can reuse this link to restart the group call. To initiate the group call again, a member of the group must start the call afresh. This security measure ensures that once a group call concludes, the link is no longer functional, enhancing privacy and preventing unauthorized access to past group calls. It adds an extra layer of security and integrity to group call sessions within the call system.

features.title: Seamless Tab/Device Switching in Group Call
features.description: In a group call, when an active member desires to switch to a different tab or device, they must first leave the group call. If they choose to rejoin from a new device or tab, their previous participation is automatically removed, and they seamlessly continue their involvement in the group call from the new tab or device. This feature ensures a smooth transition for active participants who wish to switch between different devices or tabs during a group call in the call system.

features.title: User-Initiated Public Call Rooms
features.description: Users have the ability to create public call rooms with custom names, profile pictures, and descriptions in the call system. This feature is accessible by clicking on the call button on the main page of the chat. It empowers users to host open and customizable call environments, fostering collaboration and inclusivity within the community. Users can define the room's identity and purpose, creating a dynamic and engaging space for group communication in the call system.

features.title: Image Customization for Public Call Rooms
features.description: Users can personalize their public call room by choosing an image from various sources such as local storage, camera capture, third-party platforms like Instagram, Facebook, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, Box, Zoom, and even search and use images from Unsplash. After selecting an image, users have the flexibility to adjust and customize it just before confirming it for the public call room. This feature allows users to create visually appealing and unique environments for their public call rooms, enhancing the overall user experience in the call system.

features.title: Public Call Room Link Sharing
features.description: Once a user creates a public call room, they have the option to copy and share the call room link with anyone. This link serves as an invitation for others to join the public call room, enhancing accessibility and inclusivity within the community. Users can easily distribute the link through various communication channels, allowing friends, colleagues, or community members to join the public call room effortlessly in the call system.

features.title: Joining Public Call Rooms via Shared Link
features.description: Users can join public call rooms by simply clicking on the shared link they receive. This feature facilitates seamless access to public call rooms, ensuring that anyone with the link can effortlessly join the conversation. Whether shared through messaging apps, emails, or other platforms, the link provides a direct entry point for users to participate in the public call room, promoting ease of collaboration and communication in the call system.

features.title: Previewing Participants in Public Call Room
features.description: Before joining a public call room, users can preview the list of participants who are currently in the room. This feature provides users with valuable insights into the ongoing conversation and helps them decide whether to join based on the participants present. It enhances the user experience by offering transparency and awareness of the current dynamics within the public call room in the call system.

features.title: Leaving Public Call Rooms
features.description: Users have the flexibility to leave a public call room at any time, giving them full control over their participation. This feature enables users to seamlessly exit the room whenever they choose, promoting a dynamic and user-centric experience in the call system. Whether the conversation is complete or users need to step away, the ability to leave the public call room enhances user autonomy and engagement.

features.title: Seamless Tab/Device Switching in Public Call Rooms
features.description: In a public call room, when an active participant wishes to switch to a different tab or device, they must first leave the room. If they opt to rejoin from a new device or tab, their prior participation is automatically cleared. This ensures a seamless continuation of their involvement in the public call room from the new tab or device. This feature provides a smooth and uninterrupted experience for users who want to switch between different devices or tabs while participating in a public call room within the call system.

features.title: Unique Call Link Generation
features.description: Upon initiation of any call, the call system dynamically generates a unique call link. This distinctive link is exclusively tied to the specific call session, contributing to heightened privacy and security. By ensuring that each call has its unique identifier, the system reinforces the confidentiality and integrity of communications within the call system. This feature is pivotal in maintaining a secure and private environment for users engaging in calls.

features.title: Automatic Expiry of Call Links
features.description: After the conclusion of a call, the unique call link automatically expires, rendering it invalid for any future use. This deliberate expiration mechanism enhances security by preventing any unauthorized attempts to access or reuse the link. By dynamically managing the lifecycle of call links, the system ensures that privacy is consistently maintained in the call system. This feature adds an extra layer of protection, safeguarding the integrity of each call session.

features.title: Authorization Check for Call Access
features.description: Before allowing users to join any call through a link, the call system performs a thorough authorization check. Only users who have been granted the necessary authorization are permitted to join the call, ensuring a secure and controlled access environment. This stringent authorization process guarantees that only authorized individuals can participate in the call, minimizing the risk of unauthorized access and enhancing the overall security of the call system.

features.title: Dynamic Peer IDs for Enhanced Privacy
features.description: In the call system, each user is assigned a unique and randomly generated peer ID that undergoes continuous changes. When users connect with each other, the call system utilizes these dynamic IDs for communication. User IDs are only shared with others when explicit authorization to call has been granted. This approach significantly enhances privacy by ensuring that user identities are protected, and communication is established only between authorized users, contributing to a secure and confidential call system.

features.title: Secure Login Requirement for Call Access
features.description: Prior to joining any call via a provided link, users must log in to the system. This mandatory login process ensures that only authenticated users, who are authorized for the specific call, can access the call session. By incorporating this secure login requirement, the call system adds an extra layer of verification, enhancing the overall security and safeguarding against unauthorized access to calls. This feature prioritizes user authentication and access control for a protected call environment.

features.title: Automatic Connection Recovery
features.description: In the event of fluctuating network connections during a call, the call system initiates automatic efforts to reconnect the affected user. By continuously attempting to restore the user's connection, the system ensures a seamless and uninterrupted call experience. This feature is designed to address temporary disruptions and enhances the overall reliability of the call system, providing users with consistent and stable communication even in the face of network fluctuations.

features.title: Permission Guidance for Camera and Mic Access
features.description: When a user attempts to join a call without granting the necessary permissions for camera or microphone access, the call system displays a clear message notifying the user about the missing permissions. Additionally, informative guidance is provided, explaining how to enable these permissions. This user-friendly feature ensures that users can easily troubleshoot and configure their settings, allowing them to participate seamlessly in calls by granting the required permissions for camera and microphone use.

features.title: Error Handling and Solution Display
features.description: In the presence of any errors during call initiation or operation, the call system promptly displays an error message along with a detailed explanation of the issue. To further enhance user experience, the system also provides possible solutions or guidance to address the error.
